description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Record yourself with your Xbox 360 headset, microphone or Kinect in All Seeing Eye Games' Recording Studio.  Sing a song, play an instrument, act out a radio drama or just make funny voices.  Then go online and share your recordings with friends.  Any sound you can make, you can record and share.  Create.  Record.  Share.  Recording Studio.
